verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm.<s%> O <S%H7891>sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song;<s%> for he has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> things: his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> has gotten him the <S%H3467>victory.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has made <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation:<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> has he openly <S%H1540>showed<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>

He has <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and his <S%H530>truth<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>
Make a joyful noise to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> make a loud <S%H6476>noise,<s%> and <S%H7442>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise.
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with the <S%H3658>harp;<s%> with the <S%H3658>harp,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H2172>psalm.<s%>
With <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H7782>cornet<s%> make a joyful noise <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H4428>King.<s%>
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar,<s%> and the <S%H4393>fullness<s%> thereof; the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.
Let the <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands:<s%> let the <S%H2022>hills<s%> be <S%H7442>joyful<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>

<S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for he <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall he <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H4339>equity.<s%>
